name: Steve Fox
text: Update 2/18/20 Today they refused to accept legal tender. Pointed to a torn piece of paper taped to the counter stating they no longer accept 50 or 100 dollar bills. No where on the website do they tell you this! Review changed from 5 star â€¦More

name: Brad Storts
text: Pizzas always come messed up

name: Yung Gnar
text: Staff isnâ€™t good. We ordered our pizza and then got put on hold. A lady answered the phone and re took our order. When we asked her what was going on she completely ignored our question. The pizza was very bad and dry. I would go elsewhere. Itâ€™s not Pizza Hut thatâ€™s not good itâ€™s the people that run this location.

name: Bidisha Nag
text: Never had a problem as others mentioned. Pizza is standard. Only issue is the in and out of the parking lot. It is a little complicated

name: Ron Matley
text: Pizza was done on time and exactly what we expected when we got it home.

name: Mark Dickson
text: An hour and a half later, cold, smashed pizza shows up

name: Ashley Webb
text: Love this location! They are always super polite and make the food really well and quickly! I always order on my app for lunch and pick it up about 15 min later and.its just out of the oven. They have sodas there if you need a drink and they always offer plates, napkins, and seasoning packets.

name: Rochelle Wagner
text: Super friendly staff and consistently yummy pizza.  When I request/order extra cheese they put plenty on.  The pizzas that I have gotten at this location were always warm and yummy.

name: Jill Crabtree
text: 2 hr wait for order despite being told 20 min. Mgr blamed waiting customers for not knowing better and called coworkers "retards." After the wait, pizza was over-cooked and wings were under-cooked. I'll drive to any other Pizza Hut than go back.

name: Nina Bowman
text: Ordered from a few times.. this time the delivery guy shorted me change.  When I called about my $15 the guy had lied and said I gave him a $20 tip. Why would anyone do that for a $28.00 order? Complete scumbag. We will never order from â€¦More

name: George Jefferson
text: Pizza isn't very good but it's better than Papa John's! About the only good thing about it.

name: Ben Caylor
text: If I could give a 0 I would. Do not order delivery online they don't have drivers and don't stop you from ordering delivery now I have to wait 5 business days to get my money back and not all of it the tax tip and delivery charge I won't get back cons at the best level.

name: John Lanier
text: Website says they close at 10, store manager refused an order at 9. Great customer service!

name: J M
text: Changed the recipe on hand tossed crust... Absolutely disgusting. I've had better frozen pizza, it actually reminds me if a cheaper version of Dominoes but it's not cheap!

name: avelina gonzo
text: Great service good pizza

name: Jeff George
text: We ordered 14 pizzas for lunch for a training seminar last Wednesday. The pizzas were hot and delivered on time. We were running behind so the driver came in a set things up for us. Later, PIzza Hut manager Jeff Ross called to make sure â€¦More

name: Brian Griffin
text: I love the pizza and the delivery service is always timely.  We use them frequently.  I did not give them 5 stars because they cannot always get the order right.

name: Patricia Ward
text: I work here it is carry out and delivery

name: Sean M
text: Previously 3 stars, but now 1 and the worst place to go.  They can't get an order right...they do nothing to address their mistake and have the worst customer service I've dealt with.  On to another pizza place for Friday night pizza.

name: Martha McGuffey
text: Awful service. Closed early despite what they said online and on the stores. Claimed we didn't order and it didn't go through. Good job on losing business and I will be letting others know.

name: Misti S
text: Great food, hot, tasty and i got it half off with a couponðŸ˜„

name: Dylan Montroy
text: Out of all the pizza joints in Powell this one is BY FAR the WORST. The pizza is terrible and the customer service is even worse. They screwed up my order and the manager would not admit it he pretty much called me a liar.  I wish I could â€¦More

name: Randall Johnson
text: Had a very rude manager try to tell me that they would not do anything about an order that took about two hours to reach us. MUCH better off calling their corporate office and placing an order that way. All in all, go to the one on 161 and Sawmill.

name: Ashley Jones
text: So much for a first impression! This place is a joke.  I called back to change my order from delivery to pickup because it would've taken 45 mins and the kid who answered the phone said ok bye and hung up on me no new total no new pick-up â€¦More

name: John Coctosen
text: Went to pick up an order earlier this evening and in the parking lot in front of this pizza hut location I stopped to let an older woman back out of her parking spot and the car behind me starts honking and yelling out his window at me to â€¦More

name: Sunny Patel
text: Awful service with a 2 hour wait time for the food. Even though this was a inconvenience we were no compensated. I would NEVER recommend ordering food. Also waited on the phone for 22 Mins.

name: Dianne Herman
text: Awesome as always!

name: Ashley Huntzinger
text: so yummy

name: Brandon Bridgewater
text: Order what you want, the way you want it, and there shouldn't be an issue. Had no problems

name: Haley Jaynes
text: Pizza was raw

name: Sam azz
text: I like the area

name: Cord Luyster
text: Good food

name: Jafar Nowarah
text: Always good

name: Stephany Bateman
text: Awful service and terrible pizza
